import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './AboutUs.css'; const AboutUs = () => { const [activeCategory, setActiveCategory] = useState('All'); const galleryImages = [ { id: 1, category: 'Software', src: 'path-to-image1.jpg', alt: 'Software Training' }, { id: 2, category: 'Placement', src: 'path-to-image2.jpg', alt: 'Placement Event' }, { id: 3, category: 'Training', src: 'path-to-image3.jpg', alt: 'Employee Training' }, { id: 4, category: 'Software', src: 'path-to-image4.jpg', alt: 'Software Development' }, { id: 5, category: 'Employees', src: 'path-to-image5.jpg', alt: 'Employee Team' }, { id: 6, category: 'Offices', src: 'path-to-image6.jpg', alt: 'Office Workspace' }, ]; const filteredImages = galleryImages.filter((image) => activeCategory === 'All' || image.category === activeCategory ); return (

Welcome to Our Company

We specialize in Software Training, Development, Placement, and more!

About Us

Our company is dedicated to providing high-quality training and development in the field of software. We focus on upskilling individuals for a successful career in tech, with a team of experienced professionals, state-of-the-art resources, and a strong emphasis on practical learning.

Our Gallery

    {['All', 'Software', 'Placement', 'Training', 'Employees', 'Offices'].map((category) => (
    • ))}

{image.alt}

))}
{/* New Section */}

Our Vision

Our mission is to inspire and empower individuals by delivering exceptional training and development programs. We envision a future where everyone has access to the skills and resources they need to thrive in the modern tech-driven world.

Join us in our journey to make a lasting impact in the field of technology, education, and beyond!

); }; export default AboutUs;
